name: 职场上升记
description:
【 Game Introduction 】

Finally out of college and into the real world of work.With a good vision of life, start to experience a wonderful life and all kinds of people and things in the workplace.There will be colorful scenes waiting for you. Let you quickly improve and growth in a variety of scenes .What kind of people and things will you encounter in your upcoming career.Look forward to their arrival......

We yearn for the sun, desire to grow up, grow up as a social responsibility.
No matter what kind of situation we encounter in the workplace, we will face it with a positive attitude and let things grow in a bright direction.
In a variety of occasions continue to absorb nutrients to thrive.
We will face life with a stronger side. I hope you do the same, make a dazzling career.

【 Game Features 】

This is a game that is played in daily work life.
QQ Group：335449305
game + patch It will have more flavor！！！！
So be sure to join the group！！！！

In this game, you play the protagonist in the workplace and every corner.

Office story

​ You have to clock in to the office every day with a positive attitude.
You have to work positively so that you can earn little gifts for your cute friends.
In this way, we can harvest the love of little sister faster, so as to continuously experience and make life colorful;

​ There are many lovely little sisters in the office, they have a different mood every day.
You can chat and interact with them from time to time, so that you can have more love for you;

Simple gameplay introduction

​ 1. If you do not have much income at the beginning, you should actively report to the office, and your income will increase after the report;

2. You can talk to your younger sister more often.
After you've had a few conversations, your little sister will give you some simple tasks to do.
When there are conditions to complete the work released by the little sister, return to the little sister, complete a task, and so on...

3. In the game there will be a lot of items to buy, these items, according to the category of flower shop, property, shop, hotel, physiotherapy shop...
Friends can delve deeper into......

4.Grow in constant communication with people and constant completion of tasks...



Whether to work hard at the office to get the attention of a lover or help out your colleagues with little things.

How exactly to choose is in your hands.Different choices will bring different scenery. I hope you can bring more beautiful scenery......



There are vast warehouses to explore,

There are beautiful villas to discover,

There are so many good things in life to look forward to...
......
